text: Is there a way to add additional editable sections in a custom quotes theme? e.g. other than the 'terms' and 'comments to the buyer' rich text boxes you get during quote creation?
The only way I have found is having the data as a deal property. But not when creating a quote which is what I think you want right?
You then output the deal property on the template.
Thanks Jacob, that was the workaround I was toying with, thought there might be a better way. Appreciate the insights
